sitrus.name: Sitrus Berry
sitrus.effect: Restores 25% HP if HP is below 50%.

lum.name: Lum Berry
lum.effect: Cures any non-volatile status condition and confusion.

enigma.name: Enigma Berry
enigma.effect: Restores 25% HP if hit by a super effective move.

liechi.name: Liechi Berry
liechi.effect: Raises Attack if HP is below 25%.

ganlon.name: Ganlon Berry
ganlon.effect: Raises Defense if HP is below 25%.

petaya.name: Petaya Berry
petaya.effect: Raises Sp. Atk if HP is below 25%.

apicot.name: Apicot Berry
apicot.effect: Raises Sp. Def if HP is below 25%.

salac.name: Salac Berry
salac.effect: Raises Speed if HP is below 25%.

lansat.name: Lansat Berry
lansat.effect: Raises critical hit ratio if HP is below 25%.

starf.name: Starf Berry
starf.effect: Sharply raises a random stat if HP is below 25%.

leppa.name: Leppa Berry
leppa.effect: Restores 10 PP to a move if its PP reaches 0.
